attributes.action: Give the public a general election in 2017
attributes.background: Theresa May and the Conservatives have become so unpopular with the electorate for both the fumbling around with brexit and their policies they should give the public a say on whether we still want them running the country with a 2017 general election.

rejection.details: In any case, we already have a petition open asking for a general election in 2017: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/156251
